text.en: For this challenge you will need a plastic spoon and one ball from your kit. Your task is to build a robot that can hold the spoon with a ball on it and carry it from the challenge field's start line to the other end of the field.

Start from the start line.
PLace the ball onto the spoon before launching.
You have got 3 trials.

You got to the middle of the field. = Good job! Let's try again.
You got to the third quarter of the field. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You reached the other end of the field. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You got to the middle of the field. = 5 points
You got to the third quarter of the field. = 10 points
You reached the other end of the field. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
